name: indian-stock-market-tracker
description: A modern, responsive website that displays current stock prices for all major Indian stock market indexes in real-time.

scripts.build: cd client && npm ci --only=production && npm run build
scripts.build-alt1: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.build-alt2: cd client && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build-alt3: cd client && npm install --force && npm run build
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.render-build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build

author: Stock Market Tracker
